attributes.action: Abolish the House of Lords and replace it with an elected house
attributes.background: The House of Lords have shown for the last 3years since the referendum that they are a majority of pro European Union, undemocratic and NOT  impartial,against Brexit and against the will of the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure how you would like the replacement of the House of Lords to be elected. You might also be interested to know that the role of the House of Lords is not intended to be impartial in its work. You can find out more about its work here:

https://www.parliament.uk/about/faqs/house-of-lords-faqs/role/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
